Text: Scenebalance, why rar? One can hide all kinds of crap in rar files. I never rar. Check my uploads. There is NO reason to rar, so stop doing it. I never download rar's. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TORRENT!!!

@ jwhitt62:  your an idiot....RAR's are perfectly fine.  if you check private trackers, that is the requirement to upload.  they must be broken up into separate RAR files.  you can upload non-RAR'ed files all you want, but that is what scene requires.
Anyone know which is better-the screener or the R5?
